title: Bug 4329: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations via the package view selection and dialog, the search dialog initializes with the fully qualified name. However, the search does not find any results.
EB: When searching for declarations via the package view selection and dialog, the search should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the package view
2. Select a package
3. Open the search dialog
4. Search for a declaration
Expected: The search should return the relevant results
Actual: No results are found
